Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Two Gigues, WoO 4

1855

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 4'

  • 1. A minor
  • 2. B minor

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/7 · HN 6009 · Klavierwerke ohne Opuszahl · ed. Camilla Cai
  • Könemann · K 116 · Scherzo, Balladen, Rhapsodien und Tänze · ed. Enikő Gyenge

1. A minor

This gigue probably belonged to a suite containing also two gavottes in A minor (WoO 3), a sarabande in A minor (WoO 5/1), a lost präludium and aria (Anh. II/14), and perhaps further movements.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. B minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5
